interview.title: Discover
interview.subtitle: our story
interview.text: Spinella is the Latin root of the word spinel, which means ruby. The reason for this name, apart from the color, is the valuable similarity of ruby ​​and saffron as the most expensive spices in the world, as well as the many healing properties of saffron and ruby, which have been known for a long time in our history and culture.

why1.title: Unique packaging
why1.text: Our unique packaging preserves the freshness and quality of our products, ensuring an exceptional experience from first glance to final taste.

why2.title: Premium quality
why2.text: Our premium quality products are crafted with the highest standards, delivering unmatched flavor and excellence in every detail.

why3.title: Direct Supply
why3.text: We ensure direct supply from farm to you, guaranteeing freshness and authenticity in every product.

why4.title: Product with your brand
why4.text: Upon your request, we have the ability to package all our products with your own brand and present them to you.

info.desc: Spinella exports premium Iranian saffron, dried fruits, spices, and nuts. We are committed to delivering the highest quality products to our customers worldwide.
